myths.fact: Our planet has continued to build up heat since 1998 - global warming is still happening

myths.myth: It's cold outside, so global warming must have stopped.
myths.fact: Global warming is like rigging the weather dice, making it more likely to get hot days.

myths.myth: Glaciers around the world are increasing, disproving global warming.
myths.fact: Overall, glaciers across the globe are shrinking at an accelerating rate, threatening water supplies for millions of people.
